name: fudgel
description: Minimalist web component library to take the pain out of automatic updates.
author: Tyler Akins <fidian@rumkin.com>

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:compile && npm run bundle:esm && npm run bundle:esm:min && npm run bundle:umd && npm run bundle:umd:min && npm run bundle:stats && npm run build:docs
scripts.bundle:esm:min: terser --ecma 6 --compress --mangle --module -o dist/fudgel.min.mjs -- dist/fudgel.mjs && gzip -9 -c dist/fudgel.min.mjs > dist/fudgel.min.mjs.gz
scripts.bundle:umd:min: terser --ecma 6 --compress --mangle -o dist/fudgel.umd.min.js -- dist/fudgel.umd.js && gzip -9 -c dist/fudgel.umd.min.js > dist/fudgel.umd.min.js.gz
scripts.test: npm run test:tree-shake && npm run test:component
